# Logger

TypeScript / JavaScript logger.

# Changelog

Check the [Changelog](CHANGELOG.md) for more information.

# Usage

## Use logger instance

```typescript
import { logger } from '@devindon/logger';

logger.log('log');
logger.debug('debug');
logger.info('info');
logger.warn('warn');
logger.error('error');
```

## Use Logger class

```
import Logger from '@devindon/logger';

const logger = new Logger();

logger.log('log');
logger.debug('debug');
logger.info('info');
logger.warn('warn');
logger.error('error');
```
